verses.verse: His foundation<WH3248> is in the holy<WH6944> mountains.<WH2042>
Yahweh<WH3068> loves<WH157> the gates<WH8179> of Zion<WH6726> more than all the dwellings<WH4908> of Jacob.<WH3290>
Glorious things<WH3513> are spoken<WH1696> about you,<WH5892> city of God.<WH430> Selah.<WH5542>
I will record<WH2142> Rahab<WH7294> and Babylon<WH894> among those who acknowledge<WH3045> me.<WH6429> Behold, Philistia, Tyre,<WH6865> and also Ethiopia:<WH3568> "This one was born there.<WH3205>"
Yes,<WH6726> of Zion it will be said,<WH559> "This one and that one<WH376> was born<WH3205> in her;<WH5945>" the Most High himself will establish her.<WH3559>
Yahweh<WH3068> will count,<WH5608> when he writes up<WH3789> the peoples,<WH5971> "This one was born<WH3205> there.<WH5542>" Selah.
Those who sing<WH7891> as well as those who dance<WH2490> say,<WH4599> "All my springs are in you."
